segment.source: Use the app-level and account-level affiliates performance reports on the Windows Dev Center dashboard to view performance data for affiliate ads in your apps.
segment.target: Use the app-level and account-level affiliates performance reports on the Windows Dev Center dashboard to view performance data for affiliate ads in your apps.

segment.source: Affiliates performance report
segment.target: Affiliates performance report

segment.source: Affiliates performance report
segment.target: Affiliates performance report

segment.source: If you have opted in to the Microsoft affiliate ads program, you can view performance data for the affiliate ads that appear in your app in the following reports on the Windows Dev Center dashboard:
segment.target: If you have opted in to the Microsoft affiliate ads program, you can view performance data for the affiliate ads that appear in your app in the following reports on the Windows Dev Center dashboard:

segment.source: App-level affiliates performance report.
segment.target: App-level affiliates performance report.

segment.source: This report provides performance data for affiliate ads in the currently selected app in the dashboard.
segment.target: This report provides performance data for affiliate ads in the currently selected app in the dashboard.

segment.source: Dashboard-level affiliates performance report.
segment.target: Dashboard-level affiliates performance report.

segment.source: This report provides a summary of performance data for affiliate ads in all apps that you have opted in to the Microsoft affiliate ads program.
segment.target: This report provides a summary of performance data for affiliate ads in all apps that you have opted in to the Microsoft affiliate ads program.

segment.source: These reports are updated daily.
segment.target: These reports are updated daily.

segment.source: By default, the reports are filtered on performance from the last 30 days, on all devices.
segment.target: By default, the reports are filtered on performance from the last 30 days, on all devices.

segment.source: To change these filters, click Page filters and choose a different time frame or an individual device type.
segment.target: To change these filters, click Page filters and choose a different time frame or an individual device type.

segment.source: Note that all data is aggregated based using UTC, not your particular time zone.
segment.target: Note that all data is aggregated based using UTC, not your particular time zone.

segment.source: The following sections provide more details about these reports.
segment.target: The following sections provide more details about these reports.

segment.source: App-level affiliate ads performance report
segment.target: App-level affiliate ads performance report

segment.source: This report provides affiliate ads performance data in graph and table form for the currently selected app in the dashboard.
segment.target: This report provides affiliate ads performance data in graph and table form for the currently selected app in the dashboard.

segment.source: To view this report, select one of your apps in the dashboard and click AnalyticsAffiliates performance in the navigation pane.
segment.target: To view this report, select one of your apps in the dashboard and click AnalyticsAffiliates performance in the navigation pane.

segment.source: The data is obtained from the following seven performance metrics we track for the ads in your app:
segment.target: The data is obtained from the following seven performance metrics we track for the ads in your app:

segment.source: Estimated earnings (approved): The estimated amount of money you received as a commission for approved purchases made by users clicking affiliate ads in your app.
segment.target: Estimated earnings (approved): The estimated amount of money you received as a commission for approved purchases made by users clicking affiliate ads in your app.

segment.source: Estimated earnings (pending approval): The estimated amount of money you could receive as a commission for the purchases that are pending approval.
segment.target: Estimated earnings (pending approval): The estimated amount of money you could receive as a commission for the purchases that are pending approval.

segment.source: Impressions: The number of times an affiliate ad was shown in your app.
segment.target: Impressions: The number of times an affiliate ad was shown in your app.

segment.source: Clicks: The number of times someone clicked on an affiliate ad in your app.
segment.target: Clicks: The number of times someone clicked on an affiliate ad in your app.

segment.source: CTR: Click-through rate, meaning the number of times an affiliate ad was clicked, divided by the number of affiliate ad impressions.
segment.target: CTR: Click-through rate, meaning the number of times an affiliate ad was clicked, divided by the number of affiliate ad impressions.

segment.source: Purchases (approved): The number of approved purchases made by users clicking affiliate ads in your app.
segment.target: Purchases (approved): The number of approved purchases made by users clicking affiliate ads in your app.

segment.source: Purchases (pending approval): The number of purchases pending approval that were made by users clicking affiliate ads in your app.
segment.target: Purchases (pending approval): The number of purchases pending approval that were made by users clicking affiliate ads in your app.

segment.source: Note After a user buys a product in the Store, there is a 45 day waiting period before the purchase can be approved for the affiliate ads program.
segment.target: Note After a user buys a product in the Store, there is a 45 day waiting period before the purchase can be approved for the affiliate ads program.

segment.source: Because of this waiting period, the Estimated earnings (approved), Estimated earnings (pending approval), Purchases (approved) and Purchases (pending approval) data for a given day can change after purchases are approved or rejected.
segment.target: Because of this waiting period, the Estimated earnings (approved), Estimated earnings (pending approval), Purchases (approved) and Purchases (pending approval) data for a given day can change after purchases are approved or rejected.

segment.source: Dashboard-level affiliate ads performance report
segment.target: Dashboard-level affiliate ads performance report

segment.source: The Affiliates performance section on your Dashboard overview page provides a summary of performance data for affiliate ads in all apps that you have opted in to the Microsoft affiliate ads program, in graph and table form.
segment.target: The Affiliates performance section on your Dashboard overview page provides a summary of performance data for affiliate ads in all apps that you have opted in to the Microsoft affiliate ads program, in graph and table form.

segment.source: This report shows the same performance metrics and filters as the app-level affiliates performance report described above.
segment.target: This report shows the same performance metrics and filters as the app-level affiliates performance report described above.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: About affiliate ads
segment.target: About affiliate ads

segment.source: Monetize with ads
segment.target: Monetize with ads
